release_notes:
🎵 SoundWave Update v1.0.4!

✨ What's New:
• 🔄 WORKING Update notification system!
• 🚀 Fixed all loading screen issues
• ⚙️ Improved version checking system
• 📱 Better app performance
• 🎨 Enhanced UI/UX experience
• 🔍 Background version checking
• 🛜️ Bug fixes and stability improvements
